thread.title: Coronation Street spoiler: Michelle drops shocking baby bombshell on Steve
thread.title_full: Coronation Street spoiler: Michelle drops shocking baby bombshell on Steve

author: Joshua Haigh
title: Coronation Street spoiler: Michelle drops shocking baby bombshell on Steve
text:
Steve doesn't know what to do (Photo: ITV) Share Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
In tonight's Coronation Street, Michelle drops a shocking bombshell on Steve. 
After losing her baby, she tells Steve that she is desperate to try for another baby as soon as possible. 
However, the idea of trying again terrifies him and he tries to delay her discussing it until later. 
Elsewhere, it seems Leanne has a change of heart about keeping Nick off the birth certificate. Leanne has a party thrown for her (Photo: ITV) 
Nick is over the moon about her decision, but his celebrations are cut short when David shows up and says there is a party being thrown to mark the birth of their little one. Read More 
As everyone gathers at the Bistro, Michelle and Steve are forced to watch the street celebrate Leanne giving birth. 
Their emotions are mixed, but they try their best to put on a front for the party. Michelle wants to try for another baby (Photo: ITV) But Steve isn't sure (Photo: ITV) 
Meanwhile, Eva prepares herself to visit Maria in Prison, as Aiden tries his best to mask his guilt. 
Liam spots Maria and throws himself into her arms as she cries tears of relief. 
Coronation Street airs tonight on ITV1 at 7:30pm Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
